versions.name: Initial version
versions.sound: 3-channel (AY-3-8910) PSG chip, built-in speaker mounted near the top of the unit. From fm77 av onwards, 6 channel ym2203 (3psg+3fm)
versions.summary: The FM-7 is a home computer created by Fujitsu. It was first released in 1982 and was sold in Japan and Spain. It is a stripped-down version of Fujitsu's earlier FM-8 computer, and during development it was referred to as the "FM-8 Jr."
